mapper.select: select * from adminlog where adminTime between #{beginTime} and #{endTime}
select * from adminlog where adminLoginId=#{adminLoginId} and adminDo=#{adminDo}
select * from adminlog where adminLoginId=#{adminLoginId} and adminTime between #{beginTime} and #{endTime}
select * from adminlog where adminDo=#{adminDo} and adminTime between #{beginTime} and #{endTime}
select * from adminlog where adminDo=#{adminDo} and adminTime between #{beginTime} and #{endTime} and adminLoginId=#{adminLoginId}
